sentences.en: Gaming revenues in the former Portuguese enclave increased 22 per cent last year to $ 7.16 bn.
sentences.cn: 去年,澳门博彩业收入增长22%,至71.6亿美元.

sentences.en: Jun : But how did you find this little enclave? How did this all start?
sentences.cn: 小君: 你是怎么发现这个小部落的? 一切是如何开始的?

sentences.en: Nagorno-Karabakh is an Armenian enclave inside Azerbaijan.
sentences.cn: 纳戈尔诺-卡拉巴赫是阿塞拜疆境内亚美尼亚人聚居的一块飞地。

sentences.en: Q: Where do I get Enclave Power Armor?
sentences.cn: 问: 我在哪里能够得到飞地动力装甲?

sentences.en: The attack struck Kabul's diplomatic enclave in the heart of the city.
sentences.cn: 袭击发生在喀布尔市中心的外交使领馆区,目标对准ISAF总部这个最显赫的海外目标之一.

sentences.en: the former Portuguese enclave of East Timor
sentences.cn: 东帝汶的前葡萄牙人聚居地

sentences.en: The rebel enclave is coming under sustained pressure from the army.
sentences.cn: 被叛军所控制的土地遭到军队持续不断的压迫.

words.tran_cn: 飞地（指在本国境内的隶属另一国的一块领土）；被包围的领土；被包围物

trans.tran_cn: 飞地（指在本国境内的隶属另一国的一块领土），被包围的领土
trans.tran_en: a small area that is within a larger area where people of a different kind or nationality live
